name: tour_rankings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool golf_leaderboard_data.
Tool description: Major golf tours, fixtures, results and up to the minute leaderboard data to enhance your applications.
API description: See player rankings accross the various tours given a `tour_id` and `season`

tour_id.description: The identifier for the particular golf tour.

season.description: The year representing the season of the golf tour.
